content: 1st stitch skip 1stst 2tr into next st *treble_crochet into next 3 sts 2tr into next st repeat from * to end treble_crochet into last st treble_crochet into 3rd chain of the ch3 turn 60 sts row 3 ch2 counts as 1st stitch skip 1stst treble_crochet into next 8 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 9 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 20 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 9 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 8 sts treble_crochet into 2ndch of ch2 turn 72 sts row 4 join into round ch2 counts as 1st stitch skip 1stst treble_crochet into next 10 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 11 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 24 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 11 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 10 sts treble_crochet into 2ndch of ch2 do not turn 84 sts slip_stitch to top of beg ch2 to join here and for all further rounds row 5 ch2 counts as 1ststitch treble_crochet into next 12 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 13 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 28 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 13 sts 4tr into next st treble_crochet into next 13 sts slip_stitch into 2ndch of starting ch2 from this round 96 sts row 6 ch2 counts as 1ststitch treble_crochet into next 14 sts 2tr into next st treble_crochet into next 15 sts 2tr into next st treble_crochet into next 32 sts 2tr into next st treble_crochet into next 15 sts 2tr into next st treble_crochet into next 15 sts join with slip_stitch to complete round 100 sts your increasing row are now finished row 7 ch2 counts as 1ststitch treble_crochet into next and each st to end treble_crochet into 2ndch of ch2 100 sts sleeve divide - row 8 ch2 counts as 1ststitch treble_crochet into next 16 sts ch2 skip next 16 sts treble_crochet into next 34 sts ch2 skip next 16 sts treble_crochet into next 16 sts treble_crochet into base of beg ch2 then slip_stitch into 2ndch of beg ch2 to complete round then cut yarn 72 sts incl chain sts at underarms body section of jacket the stitch pattern for the body is created using a two row pattern repeat as follows row 9 - cluster stitch row 1 using contrast cluster colour join with standing double_crochet into the first of two chain in either underarm this is the new beginning of round bor *ch1 skip next st double_crochet in next st repeat from * around slip_stitch into first double_crochet to complete round changing colour to main cluster colour at same time row 10 - cluster stitch row 2 ch2 does not count as a st cluster st in each chain space around join with slip_stitch to top of beg ch2 changing back to contrast colour at the same time row 11 - chain1 and double_crochet into same chain as slip_stitch
